TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Repair, maintenance and associated services related to aircraft, railways, roads and marine equipment

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR504

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BERD - Proyecto de trolebús en Dnipró
BERS - Progetto di filobus a Dnipro
EBOR - Projekt týkající se trolejbusů ve městě Dněpropetrovsk
EBOR - Projekt dotyczący trolejbusów w Dnieprze
EBOR - Projekt trolejbusov v meste Dnipro
EBOR - Projekt za trolejbus v Dnipru
ЕБВР - Проект за тролейбуси в Днепър
BERD - Proiectul de troleibuz din Dnipro

CONTENTS.P: Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice

The communal enterprise “Dniprovkiy electrotransport” (“the company”), a municipal public transport operator, wholly owned by the City of Dnipro, and Dnipro city management have applied for loan financing from the European bank for reconstruction and development (“the bank”) to finance the renewal of company’s trolleybuses fleet and modernisation of selected infrastructure. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of EUR 10 000 000 equivalent will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services using the proceeds of the loan:
— Low-floor 12m trolleybuses (including diagnostic equipment, tools, spare parts and associated services),
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Communal Enterprise “Dniprovkiy Electrotransport” of Dnipro City Council, Address:

The communal enterprise “Dniprovkiy electrotransport” (“the company”), a municipal public transport operator, wholly owned by the City of Dnipro, and Dnipro city management have applied for loan financing from the European bank for reconstruction and development (“the bank”) to finance the renewal of company’s trolleybuses fleet and modernisation of selected infrastructure. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of EUR 10 000 000 equivalent will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services using the proceeds of the loan:
— Low-floor 12m trolleybuses (including diagnostic equipment, tools, spare parts and associated services),
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Communal Enterprise “Dniprovkiy Electrotransport” of Dnipro City Council, Address:
